title: Score 20% off the innovative Smart Garden 3
content:
Do you love growing your own herbs, fruits and vegetables, but find it difficult to maintain them? If so, discover the future of indoor plant growing with the Smart Garden 3. This clever Click & Grow planter automatically cares for your plants, ensuring they have enough water, light and nutrients – and using it couldn’t be simpler! All you have to do is attach one of the biodegradable plant pods, fill the water tank, plug in the power cord and let the Smart Garden 3 take care of the rest! With this exclusive deal, you can get this innovative gadget for just £72, instead of the usual £90.45. To claim your 20% off, just use the code UKSPRING20 at checkout!

Get 20% off now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Ready to revolutionise your indoor planting experience? Simply use the code UKSPRING20 and get…

  • The Smart Garden 3
  • 2 x lamp extension arms
  • A quick start guide with professional gardening tips
  • 3 x complimentary soil pods with basil seeds

How do Click & Grow gardens work?

Rather than relying on hydroponics or aeroponics like most indoor gardens, Click & Grow gardens use NASA-inspired Smart Soil technology, which creates the perfect environment for your plants to thrive. Unlike regular soil, it breathes with your plant and evenly disperses air and water based on its needs – and it contains no pesticides, fungicides or hormones. Here are just some of the other benefits you’re sure to love…

  • Plants grow 30-50% faster and can contain up to 3 times more antioxidants than store-bought greens
  • No food is wasted as you can harvest right before consumption
  • Each plant pod is made of a nutrient-rich coconut coir and peat mixture
  • The garden is made of strong, safe and widely recycled plastic
  • Click & Grow offers more than 65 plant varieties – and regularly adds new ones
  • A 100% sprouting guarantee – if it doesn’t grow, you’ll get your plant pods replaced free of charge

Offer ends 05/07/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.
